headline: Miss Out On The Philip Morris Surge? British American Tobacco Offers A Compelling Opportunity
summary: Philip Morris's stock surged over 41.50% in 2025, driven by the success of its innovative nicotine pouch product, Zyn, which received FDA marketing approval.

headline: Best Tobacco Stock to Buy Right Now: Altria vs. Philip Morris
summary: Altria Group (NYSE: MO) makes and sells Marlboro cigarettes.  Philip Morris International (NYSE: PM) makes and sells Marlboro cigarettes.  Philip Morris was spun off by Altria so the latter could focus entirely on the North American market.
